title: Labour Code Delays: Field-Level Readiness & Worker Protections
summary: Staggered notifications and uneven readiness among states sustain ambiguity for employers and workers; IAMC can inform members on practical compliance steps and rights safeguards.
risks: Service disruptions from misinterpretation of compliance windows
Narrative drift framing IAMC as partisan rather than rights-focused
Confusion among migrant workers on entitlements
opportunities: Partner with legal aid clinics for hotline pilots
recommendations: Publish state notification map within 72 hours
Host legal-aid webinar within one week
